level 0.name: Clumsy Dodge
level 0.description:
Move one square in any direction, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC {DC}. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card. Double the DC of the above check to move two squares in a straight line.

This card may be played as an interrupt (after cards are resolved)

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

level 0.name: Step
level 0.description:
Simple version: Move AGL/2 + 1 squares.

Correct version (stops some game-breaking problems with multiple square movement): Move one square in any direction. If this card was activated at more than 2 priority, move this card down the priority track by two spots. It may be activated again.

Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Hard-Style Strike
level 0.description:
Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square

Deal (1d4 - 2 + STR/2) damage.

Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Soft-Style Strike
level 0.description:
Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square

Your target rolls a DC {DC} STR or AGL + 1d8 check. If they fail, they move one square in any direction, your choice, and your strikes against them next round have +2 damage. If they fail by 2 or more, you may also give them the 'prone' card.

Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Dagger Strike
level 0.description:
Requires a dagger

Choose one of:
  • Deal (TEC/2 - 2 adv: 1d8 + STR/2) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square. Gain +2 PRI vs armor
  • Deal (TEC/2 - 6 adv: 1d8 + STR/2, 1-3 on die means 0 dmg) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 4. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.


Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Bright In The Face
level 0.description:
Requires a bright flashlight

Target anyone within line of sight. Any attack they make within the 90-degree cone centered on you has two degrees of disadvantage, as long as this card is active. Discard it if you activate a non-mental action.

level 0.name: Water Splash
level 0.description:
Requires some sort of splashable liquid.

Target a line of length 3. The nearest creature along that line gets hit by your liquid. Lose the liquid.

level 0.name: Longsword Strike
level 0.description:
Requires a longsword

Choose one of:
  • Deal TEC adv: 1d12 + STR/2 damage, targeting a line of three squares.
  • Deal {DMG} damage, targeting a cone of two squares.


Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Megaton Hammer Strike
level 0.description:
Requires a giant hammer

Choose one of:
  • Overhand Strike: Deal STRd6 damage to a square within reach two of you. Anyone (except you) within one square of that roll 1d6 + AGL with DC (STR - 2) * 2 or fall prone
  • Sweep Strike: Deal (STR/2)d4 damage, targeting a cone of two squares.
Lose 2 PRI on all actions next round.

Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Club Strike
level 0.description:
Requires a club of some sort

Deal (STR/2)d4 damage, targeting a cone of two squares.

Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Shield Block
level 0.description:
Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Your shield takes damage from the attack. If it is destroyed, any leftover damage continues toward the original target

This card may be played as an interrupt (after cards are resolved)

Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Take Aim...
level 0.description: Chose a ranged weapon and select a line to target. Gain the 'Aimed' card for that ranged weapon with that target. Return this card to your hand. You may immediately play and activate a 'Ranged attack' card using your selected weapon.

level 0.name: Fire! (handgun)
level 0.description:
Requires the 'aimed' card to be active for a handgun

Deal TEC/2 - 4 avg: 2d8 dmg, pen 3, with a miss threshold of 2 (1-2 on either die means 0 dmg) targeting a your aimed-at line, up to 20 squares. Roll damage for each target in the line seperately, and stop once any of them deal 0 damage. Remove 1 ammo. Do not discard your 'aimed' card

Return this card to your hand.

level 0.name: Fire! (long gun)
level 0.description:
Requires the 'aimed' card to be active for a long gun

Deal TEC/2 - 3 avg: 2d8 dmg, pen 8, with a miss threshold of 2 (1-2 on either die means 0 dmg) targeting a your aimed-at line, up to 30 squares. Roll damage for each target in the line seperately, and stop once any of them deal 0 damage. Remove 1 ammo. Do not discard your 'aimed' card

Return this card to your hand.

level 1.name: Hard-Style Strike+
level 1.description:
Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square

Deal (TEC/2 advantage: 1d4 + STR/2) damage.

Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: Soft-Style Strike+
level 1.description:
Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square

Your target rolls a DC [MAX(STR, TEC) + 4 + EM/2] STR or AGL + 1d8 check. If they fail, they move one square in any direction, your choice, and your strikes against them next round have +2 damage. If they fail by 2 or more, you may also give them the 'prone' card.

Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: Dagger Strike+
level 1.description:
Requires a dagger

Choose one of:
  • Deal (TEC/2 adv: 1d8 + STR/2) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square. Gain +2 PRI vs armor
  • Deal (TEC/2 - 3 adv: 1d8 + STR/2, 1-3 on die means 0 dmg) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 4. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.


Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: Focus
level 1.description:
Add +2 priority to another of your cards activated this round.

Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: Reckless Action
level 1.description:
Add +1d6-2 priority to another of your cards activated this round.

Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: Precise Strike
level 1.description:
Add +4 to the priority against armor of another card you activate this round

Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: Parry
level 1.description:
Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Move one square toward the source of the attack. For the purposes of calculating the damage of that attack, subtract a total of {DMG} from whichever attributes of the attacker you see fit.

If you can set all of their relevant stats to 0, their card is cancelled, your attacker looses all their active AP, cannot refresh this round, and, if you are in their square, you may move them to any adjacent square

Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: Weapon Block
level 1.description:
Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Your weapon takes damage from the attack. If your weapon is destroyed, any leftover damage continues toward the original target

This card may be played as an interrupt (after cards are resolved)

Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: QuickStep/Dodge
level 1.description:
Chose one of:
  • Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
  • Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC {DC}. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card.{Extras}.
  • Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.


This card may be played as an interrupt (after cards are resolved)

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies

level 1.name: Judo Toss
level 1.description:
Target: One creature that has, this round, moved to your square or a square you are currently adjacent to.

Continue their movement one extra square (or two if the one would mean they end up in your square). They immedately lose all AP they currently have in play, and all non-mental cards they currently have on the field are discarded. They cannot refresh their hand this round. They gain the 'prone' status

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies
level 1.cost: 22 - EMP, min 12, half the time sunk into learning Parry counts for this as well

level 2.name: Judo Toss+
level 2.description:
Target: One creature that has, this round, moved to your square or a square you are currently adjacent to.

Continue their movement one extra square (or two if the one would mean they end up in your square). They immedately lose all AP they currently have in play, and all non-mental cards they currently have on the field are discarded. They cannot refresh their hand this round. They gain the 'prone' status

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies
level 2.cost: 22 - EMP, min 12, half the time sunk into learning Parry counts for this as well

level 2.name: Hard-Style Strike++
level 2.description:
Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square

Deal (TEC/2 advantage: 2d4 + STR) damage.

Return this card to your hand

level 2.name: Dagger Strike++
level 2.description:
Requires a dagger

Choose one of:
  • Deal (TEC/2 + 2 adv: 1d8 + STR/2) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square. Gain +2 PRI vs armor
  • Deal (TEC/2 - 1 adv: 1d8 + STR/2, 1-3 on die means 0 dmg) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 6. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.


Return this card to your hand

level 2.name: QuickStep/Dodge+
level 2.description:
Chose one of:
  • Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
  • Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 5. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card. On a success, you may move a third space in the same direction.
  • Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.


This card may be played as an interrupt (after cards are resolved)

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies

cards.name: Tag Aspect
cards.description: Tag an aspect

cards.name: Thick Skin
cards.description: DR 6. On any round you use 'Chomp', reduce the PRI of this card to +0

cards.name: Chomp
cards.description:
Target: One forward square

Deal 1d4 + STR - 1 damage. If you deal damage, you can latch on to your target. Gain the 'latched on' effect, while your target gains the 'chomped' effect

cards.name: Rip
cards.description:
Target: One entity which you latched on to and have at least 8 bid tokens on

Deal STRd4 damage. Heal half the damage you dealt. If that would put you over maximum, gain 1/10th of the additional as permanent extra HP. Do not round -- extra bits add up over uses of this card

cards.name: Spawn
cards.description: Create 1d4 Minor Hunger Spirits adjancent to you.

cards.name: Feed
cards.description: Take 8 damage. Turn one Minor Hunger Spirit within your reach into a Medium Hunger Spirit

cards.name: Prone
cards.description:
You may not use 'movement' cards that do not also have the 'prone' tag.
Can be removed by spending 2 AP

cards.name: Grappled
cards.description:
Bid STR

As long as this card is in effect, cannot use any 'movement' cards. This card may be turned into 'Grappling' if you have at least one bid token on it

cards.name: Grappling
cards.description:
Bid STR

As long as this card is in effect, any 'movement' cards you use have 0 combo and affect both you and the person you are grappling. If you have at least one bid token on this card, you may chose to only affect yourself with movement cards. If you leave the square of the person you are grappling, discard this card.

You may turn this card's partner from 'Grappling' into 'Grappled' if you have at least your enemy's STR bid tokens on this card.

You may turn this card's partner from 'Grappled' into 'Pinned' if you have at least 2x your enemy's STR bid tokens on this card

cards.name: Pinned
cards.description:
Bid STR

As long as this card is in effect, cannot use any 'movement' or 'strike' cards. Your STR and TEC count as one lower for the purposes of bidding on this card. This card may be turned into 'Grappling' if you have at least one bid token on it

cards.name: Latching On
cards.description:
Bid STR + 2

As long as this card is in effect, you may not use any 'movement' or 'strike' cards. You may voluntarily discard this card by paying 1 AP with priority TEC + 4. This card is discarded if its paired 'Chomped' card is discarded

cards.name: Chomped
cards.description:
Bid STR

As long as this card is in effect, all 'movement' cards take + 1 AP, and apply to both you and the creature that has chomped you. All 'strike' cards have -1 priority. Each time you activate a 'movement' or 'strike' card, take 1d4-1 damage. Can be removed if you have at least one bid token on this card.

cards.name: Aimed
cards.description: When you gain this card, select a raged weapon and a target. As long as you have this card, you may fire the ranged weapon at the target. Remove this card if you take damage or activate any non-mental card other than 'Step'

cards.name: Motorcycle Gear
cards.description: DR 2. Reduce your AGL by 3 - STR.

cards.name: Riot Gear
cards.description: DR 4. Reduce your AGL by 5 - STR.

cards.name: Faux Plate
cards.description:
DR 5. Reduce your AGL by 3 - STR

Conceptual Defense: 7

cards.name: Full Plate
cards.description:
DR 8. Reduce your AGL by 7 - STR.

Conceptual Defense: 12

cards.name: Bulletproof Vest
cards.description: DR 8. Reduce your AGL by 2-STR.

cards.name: Hunting Rifle
cards.description: Counts as a long gun. Has 30 rounds of ammunition.

cards.name: Pistol
cards.description: Counts as a pistol. Has 15 rounds of ammunition.

cards.name: BB Gun (long)
cards.description: Counts as a long gun, except attacks with it deal half damage with zero penetration. Has effectively infinite ammo (I think?)

cards.name: BB Gun (pistol)
cards.description: Counts as a pistol, except attacks with it deal half damage with zero penetration. Has effectively infinite ammo (I think?)

cards.name: Pocket Knife
cards.description: Counts as a dagger, except attacks with it deal half damage and throwing it has adds 4 levels of disadvantage

cards.name: Grocery Store Katana
cards.description: Counts as a longsword. Whenever it's used, roll TEC. on 1 or less, it breaks

cards.name: Uncle Don Joseph's Sword Cane
cards.description:
Counts as a longsword.

Conceptual Damage: 3d12 + STR/2

cards.name: Improvised Club
cards.description: Counts as a club

cards.name: Baseball Bat
cards.description: Counts as a club. Deal damage as though your STR was +2

cards.name: Sledgehammer
cards.description: Counts as a megaton hammer.

cards.name: Amazon.com "Holy" Water
cards.description:
Counts as a splashable liquid or throwable container, depending how it's prepared.

Conceptual Damage: 1d4 - 1

cards.name: Duel
cards.description:
Upkeep: 2

Express a challenge to an enemy. They must roll SLF + 1d6 vs MAG + 3. If they fail, they may not attack anyone but you, and vice-versa. Anyone else wishing to attack either one of you must make the same check.

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

cards.name: Code
cards.description: This must be taken as the first card in Honor. When you first gain this card, define the code that your character lives by. This can be explicit or implicit, and does not need to be concious on the part of the character. When playing your character, keep their code in mind -- most people with honor as a motivator won't break their code unless pushed hard. If your character breaks their code, they will gain some stress (1-10+, depending). Other cards will reference this one

cards.name: Take a Third Option
cards.description: When faced with a situation where the most straightforward approach would involve breaking their code, and they have harder option that doesn't, reduce the difficulty of the harder option by up to DI, minimum the difficulty of the original task

cards.name: Judgement
cards.description:
Upkeep: 2

Target: Anyone who has done something contrary to your code, which has had substantial impact on you/your friends/the world

Gain +2 to all rolls opposed to your target

cards.name: Anticipate Action
cards.description:
Target: Anyone within line of sight.

Look at one of their face-down cards.

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

cards.name: What's on your mind?
cards.description:
Target: Anyone within line of sight.

Bid MAG on this card. When you have 6 bid tokens on this card, you may look at your target's hand.

Retrieval: 2 Fatigue

cards.name: I've seen this coming!
cards.description:
Target: Anyone within line of sight.

Decrease the priority of one of their cards by 2. If you have previously used Anticipate Action on the card, decrease its priority by 4

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

cards.name: Channel Curiousity
cards.description:
Upkeep: 2

Target: Anyone within MAG.

Increase your target's PRI on all cards by 1, or their KNOWLEDGE by 2

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

cards.name: Addicted To That Feel
cards.description:
Target: Someone within line of sight who has activated a card within this round.

Chose one card your target has activated this round, call it C. They must roll DISC + 1d6 vs MAG + N, where N is 2 if C was unsuccessful, and 5 if C was successful.
If they fail, they must immediately play the card again. They cannot voluntarily cancel it. If they do not have access to the card, they must spend the resources necessary to put the card back into their hand as soon as they are able, and must then immediately play it

cards.name: Addicted To Those Feels
cards.description:
Target: Someone within line of sight who has activated a card within this round.

For each card your target has activated this round, they must roll DISC + 1d6 vs MAG + N, where N is 2 if the card was unsuccessful, and 5 if it was successful.
If they fail, they must immediately play the card again. They cannot voluntarily cancel it. If they do not have access to the card, they must spend the fatigue necessary to put the card back into their hand as soon as they are able, and must then immediately play it

cards.name: Notice Me (Senpai)!
cards.description:
Chose any card currently in the queue for resolution that you are a valid target for. It now must target you.

Retrieval: 2 Fatigue

cards.name: Puppy-Dog Eyes
cards.description:
Target: Anyone with line of sight to you.

This round, if they are targeting you with a card you do not wish to be targeted with, They must roll 1d6 + DISC vs 1d6 + CHARM + MAG/2. If they lose, their card is negated as though they had voluntarity discarded it

Retrieval: 3 Fatigue

cards.name: Channel Attention-Seeking
cards.description:
Upkeep: 2

Target: Anyone within MAG

Increase or decrease your target's CHARM or DISC by 2

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

level 0.name: Channel Anger
level 0.description:
Upkeep: 2

Target: Anyone within MAG.

Increase your target's STR, or decrease their AGL, EMP, or EXPR by 2.

Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

level 1.name: Manifest Anger (Barb)
level 1.description:
Upkeep: No cost, but anyone holding the dagger takes 1d4 - 2 damage

Create a cylindrical crystal the length and approximate shape of a tent spike. You may treat it as a dagger dealing 4d8 instead of 1d8 damage.

Retrieval: 2 Fatigue

level 1.name: Channel Anger+
level 1.description:
Upkeep: 3

Target: Anyone within touch.

Increase your targets STR, or decrease their AGL, EMP, or EXPR by 4.

Retrieval: 2 Fatigue

level 2.name: Scapegoat
level 2.description: Chose a target within line of sight that has done something to anger you. Your choice on what qualifies. (If you're that kind of character, this could mean target anyone.) As long as this card is in effect, you may only take actions that directly lead toward you defeating that target. This includes defending yourself, but does not include attacking anything that is not directly in your way. Gain a +2 bonus on all actions against your scapegoat.

level 2.name: Manifest Collateral Damage
level 2.description:
Cover MAG + 1d4 squares with manifested anger crystals. The squares must be contiguous and start adjacent to you. For each affected square a creature is occupying, it takes 2d8 damage.

Any creature in one of the affected squares or adjacent to one of the affected squares takes 1d4 damage from radiant heat (and anything easily flammable nearbye will likely catch on fire) during the Upkeep phase. Using a movement card will break your connection with the anger. Direct (spike) damage does not affect you, but radiant damage does.

Retrieval: 3 Fatigue

level 3.name: Manifest Defensiveness
level 3.description:
Momentarily create a small patch of anger crystals on your skin, right where a blow is about to strike you. Decrease the damage from a non-area attack targeting you by MAGd4. Take 1d6 - 4 damage. (The manifested anger burns you if you're too slow to remove it and is sometimes in uncomfortable places).

This card may be played as an interrupt (after cards are resolved)

Return this card to your hand

level 3.name: Unstoppable Rage
level 3.description:
Upkeep: D*2 (D = 0 if you are fine, +1 for each state you are down)

Only useable while the 'Scapegoat' card is in effect. Take no negative effects from damage or fatigue. You may not use any non-Anger 'Mental' card

Retrieval: 4 Fatigue
